description:
I tried it. It is a drum pad interface. It seems to work well. The website is https://www.beatpad.net/
You have to load the samples to each pad by right clicking on the pad and loading a file. I could not get it to play wav files, but it worked on flac. Some info on the software would have been helpful. Even their site is does not seem to have help.
